summary:
As a junior International Relations Officer, I am the connection between international students, Dutch students and my colleagues. I am born and raised in Germany and decided to study at the Aeres university of Applied Sciences in 2017. Getting really connected to the organisation, I was more than happy, when I got the chance to start working for the International Office. I know the struggles of our international students as well as those of the Dutch students. Giving students the chance to make experiences in an international environment is one of the most fulfilling things to do. To me, it is very important to help others making the same great experiences as I did. Seeing our students enjoying their study programme and everything we offer around it, is a great pleasure. 

Do you think about studying at Aeres University of Applied Sciences? Feel free to reach out!
E-mail: k.koziol@aeres.nl
Phone: 0031 6 43416674

About International Office:
You work at a school? What do you do there? Teach? 
No, we don't teach being the International Office, but we do everything around it!
As International Officers of the Aeres University of Applied Sciences, we have a diverse job and are responsible for three faculties. We make sure that international students register with us and help them with the entire application process. We organise introduction weeks for them, help them with all the steps of the visa application and make sure they are properly insured. Moreover, we guide students in their social lives and continuously work on the inclusiveness of the institution. Nevertheless, we are also there for our Dutch students. We support them in applying for scholarships and visas for their internships abroad or help them find the right institution for a minor abroad. Our colleagues can also count on us! For them, we arrange everything around travelling abroad so that they can focus on projects or guest lectures abroad. 
As you can see, our work never gets boring! "Never a dull moment" might be our most commonly used saying.

‘Talent voor groei’, or talent for growth, is what we represent. Our roots lie in tertiary agricultural education. We focus on education and research, and on the sharing and applying of knowledge. This is our contribution to the development of future-oriented, innovative professionals. Professionals who are capable of making responsible decisions in a complex world, with a natural talent for acting in a sustainable manner.

We belong to the Aeres Groep, a green knowledge centre that focuses on education, research and various commercial activities.

treasury_media.title: Aeres University of Applied Sciences, Faculty Dronten
treasury_media.description: For 65 years, students in Dronten learn about agribusiness, food business, horticulture and animal husbandry. The programmes combine theoretical study with practical training. For more information go to Study in Dronten on our website or use the featured link to the study programs.

treasury_media.title: Study at Aeres University of Applied Sciences in the Netherlands
treasury_media.description: Are you curious about which study programs Aeres University of Applied Sciences offers? Click on the link to our website to find out!

profile_positions.description:
International Relations Officer:
- Assistance with the Erasmus+ scholarship and Holland Scholarship
- Enhancing the social life of our international students and their connection with Dutch students
- Connection between staff and students
- Assistance in the visa application
profile_positions.title: International Relations Officer
